column1: Little Goat Diner////Everything on the menu looked delicious
column2: but I ended up ordering the Bulls Eye French Toast (per a recommendation from the waiter).  It was AMAZING.  It's french toast with a circle cut out of the middle and an egg cooked inside
column3: topped with lightly fried chicken and strawberries.  I was worried it might be heavy but it was the perfect amount of cube shaped fried chicken pieces.
